name: Jan
title: jan.ai
shortDescription: Jan is an open-source alternative to ChatGPT that operates entirely offline, ensuring privacy and security for users. It's designed for developers and tech enthusiasts who need a powerful AI without relying on cloud services. Users can download and run advanced models like Llama3 or Gemma directly on their devices, or connect to cloud models when necessary. This flexibility makes Jan ideal for those looking to integrate AI into their systems while maintaining control over their data.
pros: Supports both local and cloud AI models
cons: May require technical knowledge to set up
Limited user feedback due to newness
